79561.summary: Some customers in Lloydminster are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
79561.title: July 4 - Lloydminster | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

79564.summary: Some customers in the Wood Buffalo Estates area of Fort McMurray are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
79564.title: July 4 - Fort McMurray (Wood Buffalo Estates) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
